Container.Name: venstar2mqtt
Container.Overview: Simple container that allows MQTT to be used to view data and push settings to the Venstar Local API Thermostats. Local API needs to be enabled on the thermostat. No Web UI or appdata folder necessary.
Container.Description: Allows MQTT to be used to view data and push settings to the Venstar Local API Thermostats. Local API needs to be enabled on the thermostat itself. No Web UI or appdata folder necessary.

Config.Name: Venstar Host IP
Config.Description: The IP or DNS of the Venstar Thermostat

Config.Name: MQTT URL
Config.Description: Full URL required (ex: mqtt://192.168.1.10) Usually the UnRaid server ethernet IP
